title: Reporter Displays Trump/Pence Sticker at Al Smith Dinner
subtitle: An image of reporter Maria Bartiromo holding a phone decorated with a "Trump/Pence" sticker at the Alfred E. Smith Memorial Foundation Dinner is fake.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: An image shows Maria Bartiromo holding a phone decorated with a "Trump/Pence" sticker at the annual Al Smith Dinner.
